build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --no-interaction --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: npm run build && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan storage:link && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT:-8000}
